name: Me and my eldritch parasite
description:
Eldritch parasites are not a rare sight in this world. In fact, they are freaking everywhere.
People say they are fine, but after seeing someone exploding due to them, you start having doubts about that.
Do not fear, there is a way to get rid of it.
It't not gonna be pretty tought.

Me and my eldritch parasite is a package of insanit... err, game where you have to find tools for getting rid of an eldritch parasite attached to your body in a building where rooms keep changing places overnight. Oh, and the parasite needs to be fed. Or you die.
Also there are other hosts arround. And they can attack. Or not.

There should be a list of freatures here, but I gotta go. My eldritch parasite wants to punch a bug.

Ok, fine.
-Eerie atmosphere.
-Randomly generated levels.
-Multiple endings.
-A strange photo-collage artsyle.
-Weird monsters.
